title: LP refunds
body:
Are LP refunds ever going to be a thing?

I had a Nunu support that decided it would be fun to troll my as a rammus jungler and steal all my camps. I was level 5 when the game ended at 23 minutes. 

The reports do nothing he is still playing his games now and i'm stuck with less LP and 22 minutes of my life wasted. 
and i cant leave the game either or i'll get punished with afk its all bullshit.
